ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 1110
ygData.msgSnippet: Well first off if your a first time player. Good luck geeting a druid to help. Secound i could get power lvled to 30 but ass naked if need be. Gear just makes
ygData.messageBody:
Well first off if your a first time player. Good luck geeting a druid
to help. Secound i could get power lvled to 30 but ass naked if need
be. Gear just makes it eaasyer on the druid. However you find druid
to lvl you and Useually that well toss you crap out of the bank at
you (what iam wearing)in fact my pants ar ac 4. and as far as zones
go well i just bought the plat cd set and it has all but one zone on
it. 90 percent of the sets you buy today well have these zones if by
chance you find the origanle eq game in the bargain bin its still
cheaper to buy the platinum cd set. so IAM sorry you cant seem to
find a druid to help you. the thread was on how to. not how to get
some one to do so. Iam an experinced player, and know how where and
when. As a rogue iam grp dependent on groups yet i can still solo.
only by knowledge and bandaids lot of bandaids. if your a casual
player with one or two hours a week to play try a staarting a druid
and then you could power lvl yourself.



--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@m...>
wrote:
> Well congrats to you! :)
>
> However this doesn't work for everyone AND trying to get someone to
PL
> you is a whole nother adventure in itself! Another question I have
for
> you is what type of armor did you start out with? Were you twinked?
>
> I'm not trying to rip on you or put you down for getting PL'd but
what I
> am saying here is not everyone can go this route. You offer a great
way
> to do it but again not everyone can do this. Now with EQ2 out and
all
> the ubers moving over to it, you hardly ever find any on anymore
and
> those that are don't want to waste their time with a lowbie when
the
> camp they have been trying to get access to for the past 3 months
to
> finish their epic is now free. Plus not everyone has all the expans
yet
> and may not be able to get to some of those zones you mention. Not
to
> mention the time to play. Not everyone has 4 days they can play.
I'm
> lucky I can get 1 full day half the time! Again I congradulate you
on
> your achievements.
>
> Now for those that are really that desperate (and stupid enough to
give
> full access to their account to a perfect stranger), you can try
this
> out!
> http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?
ViewItem&category=4596&item=8154542079&rd=1
>
> Good luck to all you young adventurers!
> Durgaa Silveroak
> Norrathian Ranger of the 35th season.
>
